question: The "Macocha Gorge" is located in which country?
explanation: Macocha Gorge is located in the Czech Republic. Karst landscape is formed with the flow of acidic water through soft rock, lead to the development of Macocha Gorge, also called Macocha Abyss, the deepest sinkhole in Central Europe. It is part of the Punkva Caves of the Moravian Karst Caves system drained by the Punkva River. It is a popular tourist destination.
